name: ticky
tagline: A lightweight issue and ticket tracking system
description: Ticky is a self-hosted issue and ticket tracker that enables teams to record, categorize, and resolve tasks. It features status boards, comments, and a simple web interface suitable for small teams or personal projects.

features.title: Issue Tracking
features.description: Create and manage issues with titles, descriptions, and detailed information for problem resolution

features.title: Status Boards
features.description: Organize issues on boards with customizable status columns for workflow visualization

features.title: Categorization
features.description: Group issues by project, type, or custom categories for better organization

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Discuss issues with team members using threaded comments for context and collaboration

features.title: Assignment
features.description: Assign issues to team members to clarify responsibility and track workload distribution

features.title: Priority Levels
features.description: Set priority levels for issues to focus on critical problems first

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Navigate and manage issues through a straightforward web interface without complexity

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find issues quickly using search and filter by status, assignee, or category
